comment: I wanted to like this whiskey, but it is average at best and you can get much better value for money with something like Eagle a Rare 10.

For me almost unconsumable straight,  two star bc I could make it a mixer. They're  a funky finish I'm still unable to ID... Let's leave the bouron making to the easterners. If you like this, and many people have said so, please share your insights w/me! #wanttolikeit
The low ABV really hurts this bourbon, as it lacks depth or length. Despite that, it's pleasant, with notes of chatted oak, cherry and vanilla.

Very sweet nose (very cherry, vanilla, cinnamon, cloves) gets a little smokey (cedar, almost pipe tobacco like) after the first sip. 
Rich smokey taste with cherry and warm vanilla and cherry notes.  Hot and peppery finish.
Sweet nose nice maple finish with spiced cake end, very rich
A bit too much oak flavor. Not as smooth as I like. Would not buy again
